user_stories.title: Fix critical sync-back error handling in sprite-runner.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at line 279 is replaced with error logging
Sync-back failures are logged using logger.error()
Agent returns failure result (not success) when sync-back fails

user_stories.title: Fix VM cleanup error logging in sprite-runner.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at line 399 is replaced with warning logging
Cleanup failures are logged using logger.warn()

user_stories.title: Fix item.json parse error logging in strategy.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at lines 27-32 is replaced with warning logging
Individual item parse failures are logged using logger.warn()

user_stories.title: Fix items directory read error logging in strategy.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at lines 34-37 is replaced with warning logging
Directory read failures are logged using logger.warn()

user_stories.title: Fix critique JSON parse error logging in critique.ts
acceptance_criteria: Three nested empty catch blocks are replaced with debug logging
JSON parse failures in fallback strategies are logged using logger.debug()

user_stories.title: Fix directory creation error logging in sync.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at lines 95-98 is replaced with conditional error logging
Only non-EEXIST errors are logged using logger.warn()

user_stories.title: Fix quoted args JSON parse error logging in rlm-runner.ts
acceptance_criteria: Empty catch block at line 156 is replaced with debug logging
JSON parse failures for quoted arguments are logged using logger.debug()
